data.title: Windows Server 2003 RC2
data.meta_description:
Hi,
I have installed the system on a Windows XP and it worked fine, but I had some problems when I tried to install it on the Windows Server 2003 RC2. The...
data.text:
Hi,

I have installed the system on a Windows XP and it worked fine, but I had some problems when I tried to install it on the Windows Server 2003 RC2. The Database Server (Postgres) doesn't start and when I try to start it manually it shows the following error:

"Could not start the 3CX PhoneSystem Database Server service on Local Computer.

Error 5: Access is denied."

Then I cannot access the configuration thru: http://localhost:5481/status.php. Can someone help me?

Thanks,

Henrique Carvalho

What does it show in the event logs when the services start?

Also check the firewall - turn it off to start with and see if that helps.

Just to confirm you meant SP2 not RC2 correct? RC2 is beta "release candidate" software.

I'm running no problems on 2003 SP2. Installed and runs perfect with no hicups at all.

Check the top 2 areas and let us know.
